attributes.action: give nurses the proper pay rise they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2%?
inflation runs at 3%, spiralling fuel bills,stealth taxes etc etc
the army get 3.3%, what exactly do we mean to the government? The answer lies in the derisory pay increase we have been offered,
The government know they can get away with this because the very nature of our job means we "care"
I demand NOW a fair pay rise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
